Detailed Description

A header file with the SST mutex API.

Requires sst.h (from sst folder) headers.

Typedef Documentation

SST_Mutex_T

The datatype used to keep a SST mutex data.

It is used internally by API and should be not changed directly by user.

Function Documentation

SST_Mutex_T SST_MutexLock ( CPU_Base_T  prio_ceiling  ) 

Locks mutex.

Because of the main idea of the SST the mutex functionality is implemented by raisng of the current task priority.

Parameters:
prio_ceiling - a priority for mutex, any taks with priority lower than or equal to prio_ceiling will be suspended (blocked) until call to the SST_MutexUnlock
Returns:
a SST_Mutex_T object

void SST_MutexUnlock ( SST_Mutex_T  mutex  ) 

Unlocks mutex.

Parameters:
mutex - a SST_Mutex_T object returned by SST_MutexLock function
